property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "You don't believe in ghosts?"Scully: "That surprises you?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION Or BEHAVIORAL skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to look at the top three cards of your Bureau deck. Then, you may place them back in any order.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "How you know what your opponent's going to do? You get inside his head. You read his thoughts." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's SCIENCES or adds 2 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I wish I could explain. Daniel and I, uh… I always played Salieri to his Mozart. I was never quite on his plane of intellect, but this time I found him slipping into madness, the way he began to control the others."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on an Evolutionary Adversary immediately after the Combat has ended, when that Adversary played is sent to the Discard Pile. You can start another Combat with the same Adversary for half cost (rounded up) against the same Team of Agents.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, I don't know what you're getting at here. Regeneration of an entire body?. I don't know why I'm standing here listening to this."

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Ambrose Chapel. Discard one token during any skill check to add 1 to Ambrose Chapel's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or SUBTERFUGE skill. If Ambrose Chapel's Team is attacked by the Alien Bounty Hunter, Chapel may not participate in the Combat, but he may still contribute to the Site skill check.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Ambrose Chapel is an Agent that works for the Central Intelligence Agency (C.I.A.). He was impersonated by the Alien Bounty Hunter.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token during your Briefing Phase as Directed player to be able to purchase one additional card from your Bureau deck after the first purchase of cards. You must still pay for each card drawn this way.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Chesty Short is a bureaucratic figure that criticizes Mulder and Scully's investigations' expense and efficacy. He doubts their belief in aliens and symbolizes the bureaucratic skepticism that often opposes Mulder and Scully's pursuit of the paranormal.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Agent Craig Willmore is in the same Team as Agent Pendrell, Willmore gains a +1 to his SCIENCES skill, and a -1 to his ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Craig Willmore is a Special Agent for the FBI field office in Seattle, Washington. On April 2, 1996, he was assigned to investigate the disappearance of Agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Agent Fowley allows you to choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during the Briefing Phase. If Agent Fowley is in the same Team as Agent Dana Scully, both gain a -1 to their cumulative CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills.

property.name: Bio
property.value: As an FBI Special Agent, Diana Fowley investigated Gibson Praise with Agent Spender before joining Mulder's search for an Alien Hybrid. Despite her involvement, her motivations remained mysterious, leading to speculation about her ties to the Syndicate and her role with Mulder.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token during your Briefing Phase as Active player to be able to purchase one additional card from your Bureau deck after the first purchase of cards. You must still pay for each card drawn this way.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Flagler is a meticulous investigator that analyzes evidence and handwriting samples for the FBI. Flagler's attention to detail contributed to unraveling a mysterious kidnapping case, collaborating with Mulder and Scully.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Agent Crane's BUREAUCRACY and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills are increased by one if he and Agent Doggett are on the same Team.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Special Agent Gene Crane worked under Deputy Director Alvin Kersh, assisting in key cases like the search for Mulder and the Zeus Genetics investigation. In late 2001, he was replaced by a super soldier, as part of an alien plot.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Agent Hedion. Discard one token to search through your Bureau deck and add any Keyword COMPUTER card to your hand. Show the card to your opponent and shuffle the deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Hedin assisted in the investigation by matching fingerprints found on the stairwell to Michael Kritschgau, an employee of the Pentagon's research division, leading to a pivotal breakthrough in identifying Scully's attacker.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Discard a token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any on Keyword MOTIVE or RESULT Site card. Add that card to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Jeffrey Frank Spender is the son of the Cigarette Smoking Man and Cassandra Spender, as well as the paternal half-brother of Agent Fox Mulder. He worked as a Special Agent in the FBI, assigned to the X-Files unit, partnered with Agent Diana Fowley.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Discard a token to negate one Bluff. Additionally, if Agent Doggett is on the same Team as Agent Scully, change her Keyword SKEPTIC to BELIEVER.

property.name: Bio
property.value: John Doggett is a no-nonsense Agent who frequently applies his down to earth sensibilities. A former a marine and NYPD detective, Doggett joined The X-Files, partnering with Dana Scully and later Monica Reyes, investigating unsolved cases with mysterious or supernatural elements. His son Luke Doggett was abducted and murdered.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on Agent Kallenbrunner. Discard this token to negate a Witness card played by your opponent. This token cannot be replaced.

property.name: Bio
property.value: A key prosecutor on Mulder's trial, Agent Kallenbrunner is a prominent figure within the Syndicate. He is skeptical of alien conspiracies and uses harsh tactics to discredit witnesses like Scully or Spender. His role reflects his commitment to upholding the government's cover-up and suppressing the truth'.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent includes Agent Krycek in any skill check in the Field, Agent Krycek is instantly killed and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's going to take more bullets than you can… ever fire to win this game. But one bullet… and I can give you a thousand lives." - Alex Krycek

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION cards. If you spend this [RP], you may replace it during the Briefing Phase if Leyla Harrison is in the same Team as Agents Monica Reyes or John Doggett.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Leyla Harrison was an agent assigned to the FBI. She transitioned from the accounting office to the X-Files unit. Leyla admirably pieced together Mulder and Scully's adventures, later assisting Reyes and Doggett in their investigations.

property.name: Text
property.value: One Agent (your choice) may immediately "escort" another Agent in the same Team if forced to go to the Hospital (only if chosen Agent is not required to go to the Hospital too). The escorted Agent may remove three additional points of damage while being accompanied during the next healing phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I just wanted to make sure you got where you were going safely." - Scully

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Agent Monica Reyes is in the Field, all Site cards with Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION may be played for 1 [RP] less.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Assigned to the X-Files alongside Agent John Doggett, Monica Reyes was initially skeptical but later embraced belief in the paranormal. She's characterized by her intuition, open-mindedness, and spiritual inclinations. Reyes' dynamic nature adds depth to the investigative team, balancing skepticism with a willingness to explore unexplained phenomena.

card.name: Agent Monica Reyes at Death's Door

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent includes Agent Monica Reyes in any skill check in the Field, the Agent is instantly killed and removed from the game. Your opponent may play the card Audrey Pauley to negate the effects of this card. Agent Monica Reyes takes no damage and Audrey Pauley is killed instead. Remove the Witness card from the game, whether it was already in play or not.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They all think you're dead" – Audrey Pauley

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard a token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Equipment card that increases CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: FBI Agent Mosley Drummy led investigations, aiding in high-profile cases alongside Mulder and Scully. Known for skepticism, pivotal role in arrests, and leadership during crises. Involved in capturing notorious criminals, including modern-day Frankenstein Doctor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search through your Bureau Deck and select an Agent with a Cost of 3 or less [RP] (X), and place it in the Bureau section with this card attached. If this card is negated, remove it as well as the selected Agent from the game. During the Briefing Phase, pay X [RP] upkeep or discard this card and the selected Agent. Ignore the Agent's Game Effect.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Craig, it looks like we got some invited guests…" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate any Keyword ALIEN MANIPULATION card or to heal 1 point of damage on any Agent in the Hospital.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "First Elder: "What good was that knowledge? Without the vaccine against the black oil, no one can survive."Well Manicured Man: "We have a vaccine. Developed by the Russians, stolen by Krycek, given to me."

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Agent Peyton Ritter's BUREAUCRACY skill is increased by one if he and Deputy Alvin Kersh are on the same Team. If Agent Peyton Ritter is in the same Team as Agent Dana Scully, she loses one HEALTH.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Peyton Ritter accompanied Scully to investigate Alfred Fellig, a crime scene photographer suspected of staging deaths. Ritter exhibited a single-minded focus on building a case against Fellig, disregarding Scully's cautious approach and revealing a dependency on the directives of his superior, Alvin Kersh.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Agent Rice. Any time during a Combat involving Agent Rice you may discard one token to search through your Bureau deck and add a Combat card to your hand. Show the card to your opponent and shuffle the deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Rice led the SWAT response, coordinating with Scully during a hostage situation. Despite initial resistance, he contacted Mulder's captor, Gary Lambert, who demanded to broadcast a message, escalating the tense standoff.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard a token to move Agent Dana Scully from anywhere on the table to the Team Agent Schoniger is in. Scully may assist in any skill check made by the team. In this manner, Scully may assist on two Sites in one turn.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Schoniger, with 30 years of FBI experience, assists Scully in analyzing Mulder's hypnosis tape about Samantha's abduction, attributing Mulder's memories to compensatory fantasy, and believes Samantha was likely killed in 1973.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a [RP] token on this card. This may be used to pay for for any CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or BEHAVIORAL cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your briefing phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Thomas helped FBI agents Mulder and Scully to find traces that lead them to Lucas Henry, by showing Liz Hawley, a series of Polaroid photographs of a possible suspect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Select one Agent from the Team investigating this Site. That Agent, along with any cards attached beneath it, is placed face up twelve cards down into the owning player's Bureau deck. When the Agent card reaches the top of the deck, the Agent and all cards attached to it are immediately deployed to the Field (undamaged).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Why? Why me, Gerry? Do I remind you of your sister? Why did your sister kill herself, Gerry?" - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card at the beginning of the Case Assignment or the Investigation Phases to get an additional Healing phase this turn. After that extra phase, go directly to the Debriefing phase. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check. Alternately, any card that would send Dana Scully to the Hospital may be negated by playing this card. If played this way, remove Alfred Fellig from the game. This card cannot be played during a Combat and it is not a Healing card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Do you see him? Don't look. Close your eyes…" - Alfred Fellig

property.name: Text
property.value: Force a Team in the Field to make an ALIEN INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check. If they fail, attach this card to any Agent in that Team (your choice) and remove the Agent from play. During the next Agent's controller Healing phase, move the Agent to the Hospital (undamaged).

property.name: Text
property.value: You may discard any number of cards from your hand to force your opponent to discard the same cards from their hand (opponent's choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You see, the alien fetus would give us the alien genome… the DNA with which we could make a human hybrid. A new race, Agent Mulder." - The Cigarette Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one ALIEN INVESTIGATION or SCIENCES skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Yes, get me the international operator, please. I need to place a call to the United States." - Dr. Merkmallen

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach the Alien Spider to an Agent in a Team of two or more Agents. That Agent becomes aggressive and attacks their own Team sequentially, one by one (your choice). Then the infected Agent moves on to the next Agent, until all Agents are defeated or until he is sent to the Hospital. Discard this card afterwards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm dead, too, inside, because of this thing they put in me. For what? To turn me into some kind of killing machine, or just to see what would happen?" - Edward Skur

card.name: All Lies Lead to the Truth

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card in one of your opponents Fields. Your opponent must subtract 1 from the [CP] he generates each turn while this card is in his Field. Your opponent may pay 5 [CP] to force you to discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "When I went to work for the FBI, I didn't know of my father's crimes. When I stood up to him, he shot me." - Jeffrey Spender

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your pool every time a Keyword BUREAUCRACY or GOVERNMENT card is played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "There's something you don't know about the bombing in Dallas." - A. Kurtzweil

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any Agent during a LONG RANGE COMBAT round to double that Agent's LRC skill. This effect must be applied before any other modifier and only over the LRC listed on that Agent's card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Protect me and mine with your quickening power." - Jared Chirp

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card for 2 [CP] less if played on a Site card with the Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "..Maybe it's symbolic. I mean, serpents and religion have gone hand in hand. They've represented the temptation of Eve -- Original Sin. They've been feared and hated throughout history as they've been thought to embody Satan -- to serve Evil itself".

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to change a negative skill check modifier to a positive one (e.g., a -1 becomes a +1).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Apology has become policy."Mulder: "I don't need an apology for the lies."

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "I don't think these wounds are bites or stings. There's something in here, Mulder, right under the skin."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Some whistle-blower working inside the so-called Area 51. Said he had some "big deal" information. I got to tell you... The whole thing turned out to be just one gigantic mistake on our part." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You don't have much time to get to the airport but if you're the X-Files man you say you are you better get your butt in gear." - Arthur Dales

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: ASAC Dakota Whitney's OBSERVATION and CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skills are increased by one if she and Agent Mosley Drummy are on the same Team.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Dakota Whitney is an ASAC and a Special Agent in Charge at the FBI. While investigating the deaths of multiple abductees, she was instrumental in arranging the involvement of Agents Mulder and Scully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any Agent in a Team including Agent Charles Burk to use that Agent's COMPUTER skill number for any one EVIDENCE COLLECTION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's called vibuti - holy ash. Technically, it's known as an apport - something that materializes out of thin air." - Charles Burk

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 1 to Follmer's BUREAUCRACY or OBSERVATION skill.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Assistant Director Brad Follmer had a romantic history with Monica Reyes that he briefly brought up while trying to keep her away from the X-Files. Despite his political maneuvers and skepticism towards the X-Files, he aided Doggett in a crucial investigation. However, his involvement in organized crime tainted his reputation, leaving his future uncertain, possibly facing criminal charges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent at the moment a Game Effect token is about to be removed from that Agent. That token is removed without applying its effect. Remove all remaining Game Effect tokens from that Agent. While this card is in play, that Agent cannot receive any Game Effect tokens. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: White: "Maybe we solve the mystery of the horny beast."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION or adds 1 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check, or play this card when one of your Agents must go to the Hospital with zero HEALTH to remove half of the damage tokens (rounded up). The Agent must still go to the Hospital.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I told you. She's not gone." - Audrey Pauley

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on target Team during a Combat to get an extra combatant in that Team with following skills: LRC: 3, CRC: 2, HEALTH: 5. Discard this card after the Combat phase has ended.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Is there contact with the temple?"Agent: "If you call that contact."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round to reduce the damage from any one source by one point.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Let him go, you hear me? Let him go!" - Reyes

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Excuse me, sir, Max Fenig?"Gardener: "Over there."

property.name: Text
property.value: Target Agent or Adversary gains an extra LRC/CRC bonus skill equal to the number of Combat cards in your Discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a ALIEN INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The map to our human genetic makeup every gene on every chromosome -- proof of what I've been saying. If only we could find more pieces." - Doctor Sandoz

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That repulsive physiognomy is the vilest perversion of science." - Pollidori

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION or adds 2 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Doctor Larson gave him vitamin shots. He gave them to a lot of kids. He said it was like treating their teeth with fluoride… as a preventative measure." - Beth Kane

property.name: Text
property.value: This You may search your Bureau deck for the "Lulu Pfeiffer" Adversary card and play it immediately, ignoring Activator requirements. If you do, both Adversaries attack simultaneously (treat as one Combat). Double both cards' CRC and HEALTH, and skip the LONG RANGE COMBAT round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What are you doing here?" - Betty Templeton

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Move up to two Agents in the Team investigating this site (your choice) to the Hospital with zero HEALTH. The Agent(s) may not leave the Hospital until fully healed. Combat cards cannot be used against this Adversary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard this card to change the Site Prerequisite to MEDICAL or SUBTERFUGE in a Site investigated by the Agent equipped with this card. Keywords of the Site card are also changed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's the tip of the iceberg. You and Mulder are the only ones who can bring it to light." - Deep Throat

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in the Field to reduce their HEALTH by one. Opponents may play ALIEN MANIPULATION cards that affect that Agent at half cost (rounded up). Discard this card if the Agent visits the Hospital or if the Team he belongs makes a successful MEDICAL or SCIENCES +7 skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's the same thing I had removed from my own neck." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill. Agents equipped with this card are not affected by ALIEN MANIPULATION cards. Additionally, you can discard this card to add one to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It looks like a nest... some type of black vermiform organism attached to the pineal gland..." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to OCCULT INVESTIGATION 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Where are you going?" Mulder: "To see a man about a burning book."

property.name: Text
property.value: Force one Agent with the Keyword SKEPTIC (your choice) to go back to the Bureau immediately. The Agent may not contribute to any skill checks this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Blevins: "Agent Scully. Please have a seat."

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. Target Agent (your choice) in the Team attacked by the Blinding Predator receives a poisonous attack and is considered "blinded" for the first CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round. That Agent will deal no damage during that round of combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Whatever happened to Sacks, I think it's happening to me. I'm completely blind now." - Leyla Harrison

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard an Equipment card in play (your choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm starting to get used to the dark." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Briefing Phase, place a token on Clyde Bruckman's card only once the starting token has been removed. This token is usable in the same way as the starting token. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "How do you know where to go?"Bruckman: "I just know."Mulder: "But how do you know?"Bruckman: "I don't know!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate one Witness RESOURCE immediately or to prevent the investigating player from playing any Witnesses while investigating this Site, except for Witnesses which would specifically negate this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The eyes are the windows of the soul. They tell you everything you need to know about a person. So tell me, are you lying?" - Dwight Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Play this card in your Field section. Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token anytime to look at the top three cards of your opponent's Bureau deck or to avoid an Agent to heal damage tokens during the Healing phase. When no tokens remain, move this card to the discard pile.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Rudolph Hayes' CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION and OCCULT INVESTIGATION skills are increased by one if he and Agent John Doggett are on the same Team.

property.name: Bio
property.value: John Stuart Mimms, using the alias Rudolph Hayes, joined the FBI. He helped Agent John Doggett investigate his son's murder and the murders of two women. Mimms provided crucial information and was wrongly accused by A.D. Brad Follmer before proving his innocence.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's too late to help me. I can't help myself anymore." - Skur

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds zero to one Team's BUREAUCRACY or ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check. If this card is used in a successful Site investigation, the owning player may ask "Is your X-File's Affiliation Alien?" in addition to the Site question for zero cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Cassandra Spender is, indeed, the mother of Agent Jeffrey Spender and the ex-wife of C.G.B. Spender. She was first abducted in 1973 on the night of November 27."

property.name: Text
property.value: You can change up to two cards from your hand with a similar number of Bluffs that you have already played on a Site and are still in play (face down). The new Bluffs under the Site can still be negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Appears as if he died from ingesting paint." - Scully

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to provide the keywords necessary to play any one Keyword PAWN Adversary.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Who? Who's gunnin' for me?" - Charles Wesley Gotts

property.name: Text
property.value: Agents equipped with a ChemElement Analyzer have access to the field office crime lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's SCIENCES and SUBTERFUGE skills.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Sample analysis is showing carbon, bromide, boron and calcium." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to ALIEN INVESTIGATION 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm in a room… on a spaceship… surrounded by aliens." - Chrissy Giorgio

property.name: Text
property.value: You may take a second purchase of cards after your first one (during the Briefing Phase). Then, go directly to the Case Assignment phase. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card cannot be negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Melissa Scully: "You don't know who you're going to meet when you join the FBI. You don't know how your life is going to change or how you're going to change the life of others…"

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION Or adds 1 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Does anybody else know about these pictures, Chuck?"Chuck: "Nurse Innes."

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate Combat. Pick one Agent from an investigating Team. That Agent remains "confused" until end of turn and cannot contribute his or her skills to any Site skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "What I have concluded is that this man's head was held forcibly down in the Michigan mud just a little too long."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to return target Equipment card to the owner's hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "It's amazing how things change, isn't it?"Scully: "The Caterpillar?Mulder: "No, a change for us. It's coming"

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Remove one token to add a +1 modifier to any COMPUTER or EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check made by the Team including Polly.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Holly, a government worker for the FBI, worked in the Computer Records Office. Influenced by "Pusher" Robert Patrick Modell, she leaked confidential records. She also worked in the FBI Communications Center, investigating repeated calls to Skinner's floor, while remaining friends with Agent Dana Scully.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat Agent Conrad Lozano as RES 1 if the Team he belongs makes an ALIEN INVESTIGATION 5+ skill during the Briefing Phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Lozano is of Mexican descent but is American by nationality. He works at the INS Service Processing Center in Fresno, CA. Despite his skepticism, Lozano agrees to help Agent Mulder locate Eladio Buente, indicating his willingness to assist in the investigation despite his doubts about the supernatural elements involved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team investigating a Site to increase that Site Prerequisite by two.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I protected you as long as I could. I won't any longer." - Karin Berquist

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to return one Keyword RESOURCE card to the owner's hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They called me in tonight …and they said they're going to reassign us to other sections." - Mulder

card.name: Cradock Marine Bank, 8th St, Washington D.C.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You can end this the right way." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent plays any card on this Site, it will automatically cause two points of damage to every Agent in a Team investigating the Site. If you play any card, empty your [CP] pool afterwards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We got no time Dana. We'll find another way." - Agent Doggett

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to allow one Agent on a Team in the Field to add their skills to one skill check that is occurring in another Site in the Field being investigated by another Team. The Agent's skill is reduced by 1 (i.e., Skill: 2 becomes Skill: 1). LRC and CRC may not be added.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Monica? You're not gonna believe this. We found two more cases. Two more victims to add to this thing." - Doggett

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "The pathology of this thing… It affects the inner ear and this area right here is ground zero. What if what we're looking for is some kind of a sound?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness during the Investigation phase. The Witness card is discarded. Instead, that Witness joins the Temple of the Seven Stars and will attack one of the Agents in that Team (your choice) only during an LRC round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I knew you were coming. I've known for nine centuries. It was written in the Revelation of Jesus Christ...." - Vernon Ephesian

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or adds 2 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I had this dream… had it many times. That they put Neech in that chair and they flipped the switch, but that he wouldn't die. They couldn't kill him. He's a powerful man." - Danielle Manley

property.name: Text
property.value: Subtract 4 from one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION or SUBTERFUGE skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Please, don't take my baby! Please, don't take my baby! Wayne! Wayne!" - Laura Weinsider

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card in any Section of your opponent's side of the table. While this card is in play, no Agent in that Section may contribute their skills to skill checks in another Section of the table. The player controlling this Section may pay 4 [RP] to discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Before William was kidnapped, Byers was able to tuck a cell phone under the padding of the baby" – Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Briefing Phase. The next [RP] card you discard this turn will generate twice as many [CP] tokens as its [RP] cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's not the cards. It's playing the hand you were dealt. Well, you guys get a bad deal, it's all in what you do with it. You know what I'm saying, pardner?" - Mr. Burt

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to add or decrease by two any Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've never underestimated Mulder. I still don't." - The Cigarette-Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: During this turn, you may change the BELIEVER, SKEPTIC, or NEUTRAL keyword of any one Agent in play to another of these keywords. If the Agent does not already have one of these keywords, you may add one of them to the Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I tore this off my New York Knicks T-shirt. It has nothing to do with the crime." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Ask any one Characteristic question regarding one opponent's X-File. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card may not be negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You've seen things that weren't to be seen. Care and discretion, are now imperative." - Deep Throat

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to empty both player's pools ([RP] and [CP]).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You and Mulder are the only ones that can bring it to light." - Deep Throat

property.name: Text
property.value: The Demonic Puppet initiates Combat but does not assign nor receive any damage. Instead, the selected Agent in a Team inflicts a wound upon himself or herself equal to the sum of their LRC & CRC values, applied only once. Healing cards may be used to prevent damage, including any Combat cards that do not modify LRC and/or CRC.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after your opponent asks you a question. You may respond with this phrase: "I can neither confirm nor deny that assumption." After playing this card remove it from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We have a vaccine. Developed by the Russians, stolen by Krycek, given to me." - The Well-Manicured Man

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat Dep. Director Alvin Kersh as a RES 3 if he is in the Bureau Section of the table. Kersh also allows you to choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during the Briefing Phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Alvin Kersh obstructed Mulder and Scully's paranormal investigations, assigning them mundane tasks, later Overseeing their work. Kersh, a former U.S. Air Force pilot, brought military discipline to his role. His skepticism towards the X-Files drove bureaucratic actions, often impeding the Agents their pursuit of the Truth.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Detective Barron. Discard a token to play a Bluff card from your hand at half its cost. Additionally, Barron's BEHAVIORAL and CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skills are increased by one if he and Agent Kelly Ryan are in the same Team.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Barron was a detective with the Richmond, Virginia police and the superior of Kelly Ryan. He was an extremely short-tempered man who viewed the involvement of the FBI as an intrusion onto his turf.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Detective Kresge is in the same Team as Agent Scully, they both gain a +1 to their cumulative OBSERVATION and CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skills, and a -1 to their SUBTERFUGE and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Detective John Kresge was a seasoned San Diego police officer that assisted Agent Dana Scully in investigating Mrs. Roberta Sim's apparent suicide. He updated her on Marshall Sim's confession regarding the murder case. This interaction showcases Kresge's role as a reliable ally to Scully.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on Detective Kelly Ryan. Discard a token to look through your Bureau deck any time during the game to draw any one Bluff card. Show the Bluff to your opponent and shuffle the deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Kelly Ryan became a detective with the Richmond Police Department in Virginia after being tutored as a student of Dana Scully. She asked for assistance from Scully and Mulder when investigating a bizarre series of murders and while searching for Dr. Chester Ray Banton.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Detective Norman's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill is doubled against any EVOLUTIONARY adversary played on any Team he belongs. Additionally, if Detective Norman is in any Team including Fox Mulder, add 1 to Norman's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Norman was a detective with the Newark County Police Department who was Mulder's contact in New Jersey on what Mulder initially thought was a routine homicide investigation.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Remove a token to look through your Bureau deck to draw any keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Bureau deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Lloyd Pennock was part of the local police force in Wilmington, Delaware. He investigated a murder at Paradise Motel and encountered Marty Glenn, a blind woman, near the victim. Collaborating with Mulder and Scully, Pennock navigated the enigma, maintaining an open mind in uncovering Marty's mysterious Capabilities.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Discard a token to search your Bureau deck for an Equipment card with a cost of 2 [RP] or less and add it to your hand. Reveal the card to your opponent and shuffle your deck. If the card is "Lie Detector", you may attach it to Waltos immediately for zero cost, during the Requisition Phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Detective Waltos was in charge of the investigation into the murder of Carina Sayles, of which Assistant Director Walter Skinner was accused. Skinner, a suspect in the murder case, was uncooperative, refusing to take a lie-detector test.

card.name: Die Wahrheit ist irgendwo da draußen

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to force an opponent Team currently investigating a Site to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they fail only Agents with the Keyword FBI may contribute their skills to any skill check made on this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "This ship's been caught in something called the devil's triangle. It's some kind of time warp. A rift in space."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card in your field. The cost of all [RP] cards you play this turn is halved (rounded up). Discard this card at the end of this turn. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "She found me."Mulder: "So you could save her."

property.name: Text
property.value: Pick the top 5 cards from your Bureau deck and show them to your opponent. You may play one revealed Bluff card at half cost (rounded up), if any. Shuffle the rest back into your Bureau deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "According to Skinner's psychiatrist, he's been experiencing a recurring dream in which he's confronted by an old woman." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's MEDICAL or adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "High serotonin levels have been associated with mania." - Doctor Lorenz

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Satin: "You want me to shampoo my hair?"Donnie: "I'm happy to pay extra, if that's something out of the ordinary."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card at the beginning of the Briefing Phase. Remove target Agent from play (Equipment and tokens included) and replace it with this card, representing a doppelganger with all skills reduced by one. Owner may use the Agent normally. At the end of the turn, discard this card and return the original Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Who called the cops?" - Eddie Van Blundht

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card at the end of the Briefing Phase to move any number of tokens from your [RP] pool to your [CP] pool or vice versa. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Keeping Fox Mulder down is not a job. It's your dirty work!" - Spender

property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your pool every time a Keyword SCIENCES or EVOLUTIONARY card is played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Dr. Bruin: "You'd be amazed what I've seen removed from people's throats in emergency rooms."Scully: "There's no mistake. This patient has no pituitary gland."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to discard all Keyword RESOURCE cards in play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Do me a favor, Mulder. Let me say it. Reincarnation." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Both players must discard their entire hands and draw seven cards from the top of their respective Bureau Decks.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "From Space, it seems an abstraction --a magician's trick on a darkened stage. And from this distance one might never imagine that it is alive.." - Scully

property.value: Place this card next to your X-File. You may draw one card for free in each of your opponents' Briefing Phases. You may only have one of this card in play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Scully, ya gotta see this! Scully!"Scully: "I see it."

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The entire electrical system was shorted out. All the circuitry and wiring had melted." - Scully

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Everything about insects is fascinating. They are truly remarkable creatures. So beautiful, and so honest." - Bambi Berembaum

property.value: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. This card is free and Activator requirements are ignored if it is played on a Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Then what? My marriage, my life… everything I thought I had… is nothing. It's all lies. I wish you'd never come here." - Ellen Adderly

property.value: Play this card to remove one token from any Bluff card that forces an Agent to remain in any section (or be removed from the game) for each 3 [RP] spent. (i.e.: if 6 [RP] are paid, you may remove 2 tokens).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Who are you? What do you want? Why are you doing this? Please… I want to go home." - Amy

property.value: "U.S. Government knew about the Black Cancer. They lied. Didn't have no cure… no inoculation… I think we'll quit right there. I got nothing more to say." - Terry E. Mayhew

property.name: Dialogue

property.value: "I told her it was going to be a nice trip to the forest." - Mulder

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Are you "Invisigoth?"Esther: "How did you find me?"

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I can't truly believe I'm really standing here." - Scully

property.name: Bio
property.value: Arlene worked as an executive assistant for the FBI. She helped Assistant Director Walter Skinner and the FBI investigate various cases and incidents, and was present during significant events involving Agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite from CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION to OCCULT INVESTIGATION.

property.name: Dialogue

property.name: Text

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Plans that would have worked had not a rebel alien race come to destroy them." - The Cigarette Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Subtract 4 from one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue

property.value: "This is where she was taken. This is where she was attacked." - Father Joe

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Skinner: "9mm slug. Found it in the alley lodged in the wall. Most likely from the Sig Sauer P226 or 228."

property.value: Scully: "Damn it, Skinner!Mulder: "Drop your weapon!"Skinner: "Back off!"

If this card is negated, the token remains. If the Agent is sent to the Hospital, remove it from play. Only one Agent token can be in play.

The chosen Agent cannot be similar to any of your Agents already in play, you must ignore the Game Effect and you must discard it at the end of this turn.

property.value: "Some people collect salt and pepper shakers. The fetishist collects dead things. Hair, fingernails... no one quite knows why, though I've never quite understood salt and pepper shakers myself." - Mulder

property.value: "This was all strategized - every move. I just couldn't see it. It was all of a plan." - Mulder

property.value: "This substance.. Did you find it anywhere else in the car?"- Mulder

property.value: "So you think he was abducted?" - Doggett

property.name: Bio
property.value: Frank Black was a former FBI agent who left the bureau to become a freelance consultant. He specialized in criminal profiling and paranormal investigations, often working with the secretive Millennium Group. His psychic abilities, especially his ability to "see" through the eyes of criminals, helped him solve complex and often disturbing cases.

property.value: This card will negate one Event card played on your Team.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Let me at him! I'll kill him!
