property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite from SCIENCES to BEHAVIORAL .

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Dr Yonechi: "Me? No, not yet. No one has solved vitrification."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That has radioactive properties and can take over a man's body. And it's part of an alien conspiracy to colonise the planet, if I'm not mistaken." - Doggett

property.name: Text
property.value: If any Agent on target Team has an Equipment card attached that increases LRC skill you can attach that card to Peacock's brothers instead (only during the LONG RANGE COMBAT round and only one Equipment card, your choice). Discard that Equipment card if the controlling Agent is sent to the Hospital.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to provide the keywords necessary to play any one Keyword PHENOMENA Adversary.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Dorothy! I need your help." - Leo Kreutzer

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this Witness card in the Bureau. You may attach it at any time to an Agent in that section. If any Team including that Agent successfully investigates a Site, you may ask 'Is your X-File's Result Abduction?' in addition to the Site question at no cost. Discard this card afterward.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If they find me, they'll take me. I know it." - Gibson Praise

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card in the Field. Once during your turn as Directed player you may pay 2 [CP] to move the top card of your opponent's Bureau deck into their Discard Pile. Your opponent may pay 7 [RP] to force you to discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We're doing God's work, Diana. Without this immunity, everyone would die. This knowledge is God's blessing." - The Cigarette Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to your opponent's Field with three tokens on it. While in play, your opponent must keep all [CP] cost cards in their hand face up on the table. Remove one token during each Briefing phase of any attached Agent. When the last token is removed, discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Names of people the federal government is tracking using the US census." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round on any Adversary with the Keyword PRIMORDIAL or that is capable of using MARTIAL ARTS cards. The Adversary may bind an Agent (your choice), preventing that Agent from dealing damage during the remaining CRC rounds.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Okay. 6:01 p.m., February 24. Agents Scully and Mulder in the former home of David and Nancy Kline who disappeared without a trace last July." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip the top card of your Bureau deck (flip enough cards until getting a card with a cost number). Use that number as a negative skill modifier on target Agent's skill (your choice) until end of turn. The chosen skill cannot decrease below zero. Shuffle the Drawn cards into the Bureau deck afterwards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Lyda "You look like you saw a ghost. There are ghosts in this house, you know…"

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your pool every time a Keyword PRIMORDIAL or OCCULT INVESTIGATION card is played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The evil that is here has always been. It has gone by different names through history - Cain, Lucifer, Hitler. It does not care if it kills one boy or a million men. If you try to stop us, the blood will be on your hands." - Head Calusari

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It looks like a computer chip." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to recover an Agent that was killed and removed from play, where X is the cost of that Agent. Remove this card from the game. Each player may have only one of this card in their deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The doctor says Mrs. Hangemuhl's kidneys have spontaneously healed. She's a healthy woman." - Doggett

property.name: Text
property.value: Apply a +3 modifier to any one skill check made by a Team of Agents in the Field during the Investigation phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What if he got really, really lucky? That's your big scientific explanation, Scully?" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant to increase or decrease that Combatant's LRC by two points during that round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's open. Can I help you?" - Geraldine

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's BEHAVIORAL skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I thought we might at least allow ourselves to reminisce." - Cigarette Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opposing Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they fail, choose one Agent to go to the Hospital (undamaged).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Is there some secret farmer trick to get these things moving?" - Mulder

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the MOTIVE is "Control", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "This isn't an X-File?"Mulder: "Call it what you like. Here in Roanoke they're calling it a demon baby snatching."

property.name: Text
property.value: Search through your Bureau deck for any one Site card with Keyword RESULT. Show the card to your opponent and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Bureau deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm Assistant Director Walter Skinner with the FBI. May we come in?." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Pay X [CP] to remove X [RP] from your opponent's pool immediately, or vice versa.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Find Agent Scully. Only then will you realize the scope and grandeur of the project. Go. Go now!" - Well-manicured Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after an Adversary card has been successfully played on a Site. Discard a card from your hand to add X [CP] to your pool. X = Half the cost of the Adversary played (rounded down).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I just want to say that I believe you." - Kimberley

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Oh! This came for you."Mulder: "Thank you."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to gain control of an Agent during a single Combat round (your choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "What does that mean?"Mulder: "It means... It means whatever you want it to mean. Good night."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card at the beginning of the Briefing Phase. Swap one of your Agents with an opponent's Agent of equal or lower cost in the same section (include tokens and attached cards). Players may not control duplicate Agents, and the Game Effect of the swapped Agents cannot be used. At the end of the turn, return both Agents to their final locations (sections).

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate search through your Bureau Deck and add one of the following cards to your hand: 'The End', 'Second's Elder Deliberation', 'Covering Up Evidence', or 'The Toothpick Man'. If you play the chosen card immediately, you may do so at half cost (rounded up). Alternatively, you can use this card to negate the effect of William.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Your son has to die." - Robert Comer

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after a Team of Agents has successfully investigated a Site and asked a Characteristic question regarding your X-File. If the question is answered with "yes", add 3 tokens to your [RP] pool.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "…what you may find is you concentrate on hitting that little ball… The rest of the world just fades away-- all your everyday, nagging concerns." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Move one Agent with the Keyword BELIEVER (your choice) to the Hospital immediately (undamaged). The Agent may not contribute to any skill checks this turn.

card.name: Inova Fairfax Medical Campus, Falls Church, VA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "She's not gone. Not her soul." - A. Pauley

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I, too, am a professor of biology at the university but, uh, hardly one qualified to say what must have gone on here." - Amina Ngebe

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. Dacyshyn engages one opposing Agent (your choice) in Combat. If Dacyshyn reduces the Agent to zero HEALTH, place this card on top of the Agent along with 3 tokens. Remove one token during each Briefing Phase. When no tokens are on the Agent, move the Agent to the Hospital including the damage tokens. This card is considered an ABDUCTION card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL or adds 2 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check. If played after Adversary card "2Shy" attacked a Team, the cost of this card is halved.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I smelled her perfume. That's when I knew he was lying. She was wearing her perfume when she left for her class." - Jesse

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Place this card face up in your opponent's Bureau deck and reshuffle the deck. When this card reaches the top of the deck, your opponent's turn as Active player ends immediately. This card has no effect if it reaches the top of the deck during your opponent's turn as Directed player.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I wish for peace on earth." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check. Your opponent may pay 3 [CP] to negate this Witness.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You choose the one that was your sister, and I'll tell you where she is. Hey, come on, it's a fifty-fifty chance." - John Lee Roche

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your pool every time a Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OBSERVATION card played

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "¡Por favor, no me lastime! ¡Yo tengo mucho miedo!" - Jorge

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Site. For each card in your hand with the Keyword ALIEN, ALIEN INVESTIGATION, or BEHAVIORAL that you reveal to your opponent, increase the Site's Pre-requisite by 1.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You want to see your son? You come alone and you follow my instructions to the letter." - Josepho

card.name: Kallencheck's Salvage Brokers, San Francisco, CA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Actually I'd rather know who sold you the secret." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. For each Agent that Karin's Dark Sorcery sends to the Hospital you may remove up to 4 [RP] from your opponent's Resource Pool.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Make him stop, Karin! Tell him what you should have told him twenty years ago. You're not going to take it anymore."

property.name: Text
property.value: The Kill Switch creates a distorted reality on the Team of Agents, dealing a total of 5 damage points, split among any number of opposing Agents (Directed Player's choice). For each chosen Agent, subtract their COMPUTER skill from the assigned damage - damage cannot be reduced below 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knowle Rohrer regenerates (heals) one point of HEALTH at the beginning of each combat round as long as his HEALTH is not at zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Shoot me, Agent Doggett, if you think it'll make a difference this time." - Knowle Rohrer

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Well, this is not without historical precedent. The Old West was full of traveling men who claimed to be rainmakers. The Pueblo Indians even had a rain dance.." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on Agent Krycek when he is in the Field and is involved in an ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY skill check. Krycek loses his right arm and all his skills are halved (rounded up). This card cannot be negated and remains attached to Krycek until the end of the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm sorry…Nyet! I am American…and I've been falsely accused of spying." - Alex Krycek

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to force any opponent to skip the Healing phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I have a vial that contains a vaccine. Mulder knows of it. His father developed it to fight the alien virus." - Krycek

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Langly: "Check it out, Mulder. I had breakfast with the guy that shot John F. Kennedy".Mulder: "Is that so?"Langly: "Old dude, but yeah, said that he was dressed as a cop on the grassy knoll."

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate Combat. Place target Agent under this card. The Agent may not contribute to any skill check this turn nor generate RES while under this card. At the beginning of your opponent's next Healing phase, remove this card from the game and send the Agent to the Hospital with two damage tokens.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "...it could be some form of contagious agent, like an insect-borne bacterium..."

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard a card from your hand. During your next Briefing Phase, draw two additional cards (in addition to the one you would normally draw). Ignore the effects of any card that prevents you from doing so.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I need to know the last call made from this booth." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team of Agents. If the Team makes an ALIEN INVESTIGATION Skill check 5+, look through any player's Bureau deck and remove any one card from the game. Shuffle that Bureau deck afterwards. You may only have one of this card in your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Your sis… Samantha left this at the house for you."

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat Lieutenant Kraskow's LRC skill as 4 if the number of agents in his Team is 4 or more.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Lieutenant Kraskow is a SWAT team leader managing the crime scene during a bank robbery. He collaborates with FBI Agent Skinner, who is seeking his trapped agents, Mulder and Scully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to heal all damage done to an Agent only if their HEALTH is reduced to zero after a Combat. The Agent can still contribute with their skills to the Site skill check this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I want you to rise. Rise up and heal!" - Samuel

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to cause the Investigating player to discard X number of cards (chosen randomly) from his hand. X = [CP] cost paid.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "No one believes me. I'm an annoyance to my superiors, a joke to my peers. They call me Spooky. Spooky Mulder." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team of three or more Agents investigating a Site. Only Agents with at least one of the skills listed in that Site prerequisite may participate in any skill check or Combat at this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "After what they've done, do you think I'd let them get away with this? I'm gonna finish what you started." - Linda Bowman

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Lizzy Gill allows you to choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during the Briefing Phase. Treat Lizzy Gill as RES 2 if she is in the same Team as Agent Scully. If so, Scully's HEALTH value is decreased by one.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Lizzy Gill was introduced by Margaret Scully to assist during Scully's pregnancy. Later revealed as a scientist working for a faction interested in Scully's baby's genome. Despite suspicion, her actions imply Scully's baby is a natural miracle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate one of these cards (your choice): 'Byers', 'Frohike', 'Langly', 'Call on us more often', 'No one so paranoid', 'Three words, one solution', 'The Lone Gunman', 'The Lone Gunmen' or 'Three of a kind'.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They meant so much to me. I'm not sure if they really knew." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal and in addition has a +2 in LRC skill. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of each combat round, you may choose one Agent. That Agent is webbed and cannot attack or use abilities that round. If that Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0 by the end of the Combat, you may draw one extra card at the start of your next Briefing Phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Your mouth, your tongue... there's something wrong with you." - Natalie Gordon

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Team in the Field. If the Team makes a COMPUTER skill check 5+, then they may add 2 to any Site skill check. Discard this card after you have used the modifier.

property.name: Text
property.value: This You may search your Bureau deck for the "Betty Templeton" Adversary card and play it immediately, ignoring Activator requirements. If you do, both Adversaries attack simultaneously (treat as one Combat). Double both cards' CRC and HEALTH, and skip the LONG RANGE COMBAT round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What are you doing here?" - Lulu Pfeiffer

property.name: Text
property.value: Maitreya may use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards. The damage dealt by her on any Agent can be considered "virtual": the Agents' controller may remove 1 point of damage (1 token) from any Agent damaged by Maitreya for each 2 [RP]'s spent on that Agent. This action may prevent those Agents to be sent to the Hospital.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "She's input herself into the game. We have to download her."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to search your Bureau deck for a card with the BLUFF keyword. Reveal it to your opponent, then add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to a Site card as a Resource. The next card your opponent plays at this Site must be discarded with no effect after it is paid for, except for cards that negate this card or Combat cards. Then, discard this card. If no such card is played, this card remains in play until the Site is discarded.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm telling you the truth. I only want to help these people." - Absalom

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Marita Covarrubias is in the same Team as Agent Alex Krycek, they both gain +1 to their cumulative ALIEN INVESTIGATION and SCIENCES skills, and -1 to their CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Assistant to one of the Special Representatives of the of the UN Secretary General, Marita Covarrubias is a mysterious character with little know background who provided top secret information to Agent Fox Mulder, whilst working with The Cigarette-Smoking Man.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this resource when all tokens have been discarded.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's not magic. It's your crappy cologne. Who's that with you?" - Marty Glenn

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card any time during a Combat on any Adversary. If the Adversary's HEALTH was not reduced to zero yet, you may allow that Adversary to end Combat and return the card to your hand, but you cannot play the Adversary again this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I like to say whoever God didn't get around to creating in his own image, it's our job to recreate in ours." - Doctor Kaplan

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to OCCULT INVESTIGATION 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We have come together in this life, this time. Only to meet in passing." - Melissa Riedal-Ephesian

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to draw four cards, then place any two cards from your hand on top of your Bureau deck or in your discard pile.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Close your eyes and let them come to you. They will come to you if you're ready to see." - Harold Piller

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on Kritschgau. Discard one token to search through your Bureau deck and add a keyword BUREAUCRACY Witness card to your hand. Show it to your opponent and shuffle the deck. Additionally, if he is on the same Team as Agent Mulder, change Mulder's Keyword BELIEVER to SKEPTIC.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Michael Kritschgau was an employee of the Department of Defense. He stole a core sample from an FBI lab and later revealed Mulder that UFO conspiracy was a cover-up for military experiments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to any Agent in the Field. Adds 1 to that Agent's RES value during the Briefing Phase if that Agent is in the Field. Discard this card when the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They appear to be human, but whoever left these uses the balls of his feet more like an animal." - Michelle Fazekas

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any Agent to immediately skip one combat round for that Agent. The Agent takes no damage that round and may not deal any damage either.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Well, whatever it is you do believe, Scully…when you walk into that room nothing sacred will hold." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard this card to draw three cards from your Bureau deck during the requisition phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: “Just give me my lotto ticket and, uh, a pint of malt scotch whiskey." - Clyde Bruckman

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one effect: Add 5 tokens to your [CP] pool or target player discards two cards at random from his hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think people are looking hard for miracles… so hard that maybe they make themselves see what they want to see." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team including Agent Fox Mulder and Agent Dana Scully. Choose one of these Agents to use one of the other Agent's skills during a single skill check decreased by one (i.e. Scully could use Mulder's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill as 3). You can only have one of this card in your Bureau deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Mothman is negated if the Team it attacks makes a successful SUBTERFUGE +4 skill check. The LRC round is skipped. For the first round of CRC, the chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. The Mothman may use SUBTERFUGE cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Witnesses described them as primitive looking men with red piercing eyes. Became known as the "moth men." I've got an X-File dating back to 1952 on it."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question. Prerequisites of this card may not be changed by any card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Would you defend a man who believes in aliens against the FBI and the military? " - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in a Team investigating a Site to decrease all Agent's skills by one (LRC, CRC and HEALTH are not decreased). The final values cannot be negative. Discard this card when the Agent visits the Hospital.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Never say never. Yeah, sometimes I wish I were that impulsive." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to gain one of the following: Adds +1 to Computer skill, negates one Event, or discard one Bluff card from a site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Byers: "Both of you relax!"Langly: "Shut up, ya narc!"Frohike: "It's your fault we're here."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Roche drove a white El Camino, Scully. I saw it in my dream…" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to lower a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION Site Prerequisite by 2.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Grab them Monica, we've got less than a minute to get out of here." - Agent Doggett

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to any Agent in the Field. Adds 1 to that Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill once per turn while the Agent is in the Field. Discard this card when the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We came on this case looking for a werewolf, right?" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm going to give you a tetanus booster just as a precaution."- Doctor Zenzola

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Event card to your hand. Show your opponent which card you have added. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "For me, life went at a proper pace. There were many rewards… until the moment that I knew, I… understood that… that I would never see you again… my little girl. Then my life felt as if it had been the length of one breath, one heartbeat." - William Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any combatant during one LRC round. That combatant will deal damage to their opponents first. If the HEALTH value of any opponent reaches zero after applying modifiers or healing cards, that combatant is sent to the Hospital and cannot deal any damage back that round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "You murdered my father, you killed Scully's sister, and if Scully dies, I will kill you."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Look, I have no idea what killed this woman but I have to assume it's communicable."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to BEHAVIORAL 3+

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Usually, you walk right by. You'll pass a few minutes earlier a few minutes later-- little details, they change. But it always ends the same." - Pam

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team successfully investigates this Site, the Investigation phase ends immediately. Any other Site cards in play without Bluff cards attached must be discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL or adds 1 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They were real close when Bobby was little. Always kidding around and stuff. But Bobby sort of got into that teenage stage. He doesn't want to listen to nobody." - Patti Rich

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to prevent two Agents assigned to a Site from contributing their skills to one skill check (your choice) made by the Team this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "All right, where's my next bread crumb?" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Agents equipped with a Pheromone Bio-sensor may discard it to increase the cost of all Adversary cards played in a Site investigated by their Team by 2. This card must be discarded before the Adversary cards are played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Dr. Bronzino: "I'm getting a reading here. Trace levels inside the house…"

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The town was founded back in the 20s when some of Barnum and Bailey's troops started coming down here during the winter off-season." - Hamilton

property.name: Text
property.value: LONG RANGE COMBAT attacks cause only half damage (rounded up) to Pinker Rawls.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "What'd you expect them to find, Mulder?"Mulder: "I don't know. A vortex, like the one in Oregon. Gravitational aberrations, unique chemical compositions, uh, relics that would indicate that the cave was a sacred site."

property.name: Text
property.value: Zagraj te karte aby zobaczyc 3 karty z gory swojej talii Biura. Nastepnie mozesz umiescic je z powrotem w dowolnej kolejnosci.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Skad wiesz co zamierza zrobic twoj przeciwnik? Dostajesz sie do jego glowy, czytasz jego mysli." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in the Field. Discard this card when that Agent is investigating a Site and is forced to go back to the Bureau to allow that Agent to contribute their skills to any skill check made by their Team this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Can I borrow your radio Mr. Sachs?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds three to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill once per combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Briefing Phase. Place the card in the Field. During the Site investigation phase you may discard this card to add 2 to a Site skill check on any Team containing an Agent with the Keyword BELIEVER. Remove the card in any case at the end of your turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You're saying that you're out here because of something you saw in a dream?" - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in the Field to lower the Agent's skill levels by one for each additional Agent in their Team. This change includes LRC, CRC, RES, and HEALTH. The final values cannot be negative. Discard this card if the Agent visits the Hospital.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mulder, this is not reality. This is a hallucination. It has to be. And either I am having it, or you are having it or we are having it together." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any combatant during one CRC round. That combatant will deal damage to their opponents first. If the HEALTH value of any opponent reaches zero after applying modifiers or healing cards, that combatant is sent to the Hospital and cannot deal any damage back that round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Don't telegraph that left, Dre. Stevie Wonder would see that one coming. You're fighting the FBI now, Dre. Fight smart. Go!" - Skinner's coach

property.name: Text
property.value: LONG RANGE COMBAT attacks cause only half damage (rounded up) to Ray Pearce.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've reviewed Ray's medical records from the VA. What his wife was calling Gulf War Syndrome is nothing of the kind. His entire cellular makeup was affected by exposure to some non-identifiable contaminant-- a metal." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card at the end of a Combat round on any Adversary card you control to return that Adversary card back to your hand only if the Adversary has not been defeated yet at the end of that round. You can play the Adversary card again (usual rules and cost).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "If Modell makes it through surgery, I want to be the first person that he talks to."

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Talk to me, Scully! Sculllllllyyyyy! Dammit! Scully! Scully! Scully! Scully!" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to force an opponent Team currently investigating a Site to make an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check. If they fail only Agents with the Keyword FBI may contribute their skills to any skill check made on this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "As of an hour ago, they pumped concrete into the cave. Sealed it for precautionary reasons." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Briefing Phase, place one token on one Agent you control that normally starts with at least one token. This token is usable in the same way that starting tokens can be used. Remove this card from play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mulder: I thought you said you were on vacation. Scully: "I am. I'm up in Maine."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to examine your opponent's hand and force that player to discard X cards (your choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They're all the same! This game is fixed." - Glen Chao

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in the Field. Discard this card to return a Site card already investigated to your hand instead of discarding it.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Skinner: "What is it?"Scully: "Santa Claus."Mulder: "What?"Scully: "Stop. Turn around."

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each Combat round, choose one Agent and reduce their HEALTH by 2. If that Agent is reduced to zero HEALTH during this round, Rob Roberts recovers 2 HEALTH, as long as his own HEALTH is greater than zero at the end of the round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What look like tool marks to you look to me like something more organic. Like it was made by a... a tongue or a proboscis." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Only Agents with the Keyword BELIEVER may cause damage to Ronnie Strickland. If at any time during the Combat the Team attacked by Ronnie Strickland contains no Agents with the Keyword BELIEVER,the Combat ends immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Oh, man! What'd you have to go and do that for? You are in big trouble." - Ronnie Strickland

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This place isn't even on the map. How'd you get here?" - Skinner

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Any time during the Game you can sacrifice SAC Darius Michaud. Remove the card from the Game. If so, you may ask any one Characteristic question regarding one opponent's X-File.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Special Agent in Charge Darius Michaud played a significant role in the investigation of the mysterious bombing of a Federal Building in Dallas, Texas. He sacrificed himself in the building while searching for the bomb, demonstrating his dedication to duty and the safety of others.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat SAC Fossa as a RES 2 if she is in the Bureau. If Fossa is in the same Team as Agent Mosley Drummy and/or ASAC Dakota Whitney, she gains +1 to her COMPUTER and SCIENCES skills.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Special Agent in Charge Fossa was a senior member of the FBI. She was part of an FBI team that consecutively searched for missing Agent Monica Bannan and then Cheryl Cunningham.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on any opponent's Field with two tokens on it. Each time this opponent plays a [RP] card, they must discard one card from their hand (opponent's choice). Remove a token during your opponent's Briefing Phase. When all tokens have been removed, discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, get in the car, there's no time!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Samantha's Diary to return one card from your hand to the Bureau deck, then shuffle the deck. At the beginning of your next Briefing Phase, you may draw two additional cards. This draw effect cannot be negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "It's a diary. It's your sister's."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Do you think I don't want what's best for this child? Do you think that I'm not trying to save her life?"

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION, one MOTIVE, or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Hey, guard! Come here! Andale! Hey, guard! Somebody come here!" - Doggett

card.name: Santa Monica Peer, Los Angeles, CA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE, one METHOD or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Bosco's passes with the cups and balls. Wah-day… Chubio… Colerader. Three gone… And yet, three return." - Maleeni

property.name: Text
property.value: Place 2 tokens on this card. Discard a token to look through your Bureau deck to draw any Site that asks a MOTIVE or METHOD question. Add it to your hand and reshuffle your Bureau deck. When no tokens remain, move this card to the Discard Pile.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "I'm going to get you out of there."

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in a Team. Place five tokens on this card (three if the Team has any Agent with MEDICAL skill). The Agent must remain in the Field and cannot contribute to any Skill check until all tokens have been removed. Remove one token during each Active player's Debriefing Phase. Discard this card when the last token is removed. The Agent remains in the Field. Schlugg's Cult does not initiate Combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "No! Ahhh!!! You son of a bitch!" - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Write down the question you think your opponent will ask if successfully investigates this Site. Place this card on your opponent's Field with the paper underneath. If your opponent asks that question, you are not forced to answer it. Otherwise, add 2 [CP] to your [CP] pool. Discard this card afterwards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "How is it you think you know me so well, Mr. Padgett?" Phillip Padgett: "I'm writing about you."

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per turn, the Scuba Suit adds 2 to the Agent's OBSERVATION or SUBTERFUGE skills during any skill check on any Site card related to a coastal state or country, or mentioning the words: 'Lake', 'River' or 'Sea'.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Once, I, uh... I got a quarter off of the deep end at the "Y" pool."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to force Agent Dana Scully's Team to make a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check. If they fail, move Scully to the Hospital immediately with zero HEALTH. Scully's recovery rate will be 1 damage token per turn. Attach this card to Scully as a reminder until she is fully healed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "… matching the DNA from this virus with that which I believe has caused my cancer." - Scully

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "To fit in with her brothers, Dana also shot a snake." - Margaret Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Investigation Phase. If a Team of Agents you control fails the Site prerequisite skill check, you may recover up to two cards played on that Site from your Discard Pile (your choice), including Combat cards, but you cannot play them again this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Investigation phase (before any Combat has taken place) to search your Bureau deck for any one card with the keyword COMBAT. Reveal the card to your opponent, then add it to your hand. Shuffle your Bureau deck. If the card is playable this turn, you may play it at zero cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You're free to go, of course. The choice is still yours." - The Cigarette-Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play this card in its normal way, or use it to immediately end combat and control one Agent (your choice). Move the Agent to any section of the table. The Agent must remain in that section. Attach this card to the chosen Agent as a reminder. Discard this card during your opponent's next Investigation phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If we have the courage to see into darkness we see into God... free of the clay which confines us." - Anthony Tipet

property.name: Text
property.value: If your opponent uses Agent Blevins as RES 2, while being in the Bureau during the Briefing Phase, Agent Blevins is instantly killed and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Blevins had been on payroll for four years to a biotechnology company called Roush, which is somehow connected to all this." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard this card to change the Site Prerequisite to ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY in a Site investigated by the Agent equipped with this card. Keywords of the Site card are also changed

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Security Guard: "Proceed down the hallway, please."

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on Director Carter. Discard a token to remove one Agent from any Team you control and send them to the Bureau. If in combat, the Agent takes no damage and contributes no skills.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Senior Director Carter is a high-ranking FBI official who interrogates Agent Dana Scully in Skinner's office regarding Agent Mulder's erratic behavior. He represents the bureaucratic concerns of the FBI as Mulder's investigations draw increasing scrutiny and institutional pressure.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any PRIMORDIAL Adversary. One of that Adversary's opponents (your choice) is paralyzed and will deal no damage during the next round of Combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: The printed cost of any Bluff played at this Site is halved (rounded up).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Tell him what he wants to hear." - The Cigarette-Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card any time after Diana Fowley's successfully investigates a Site with ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill in the same Team as Agent Fox Mulder. Place 3 additional tokens on Mulder's card. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That's where it all begins. That's where we need to be if we want to survive it." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to any Agent in the Field. Adds 1 to that Agent's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill once per turn while the Agent is in the Field. Discard this card when the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0. If played on Agent Dana Scully this card costs 1 [RP] less.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Hartwell: "You really know your stuff, Dana."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to change the Site Prerequisite from CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION to SCIENCES.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Get Out, Scully! This whole place could blow!" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your pool every time a Keyword BEHAVIORAL or SUBTERFUGE card is played

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Please. I'm Sister Abby. This is Brother Oakley. We're all saddened by what has happened in your world, but it does not concern us." - Sister Abigail

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant during a LONG RANGE COMBAT round to reduce the damage from all opponent sources by one point.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Oh God, John, they're smoking us out. John, I need you here. I need you to focus here John." - Agent Reyes

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard this card during the Investigation phase to search through your Discard Pile and add one Keyword RESOURCE card to your hand. Show the card to your opponents.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'd like to interview your son Charlie, Mr. Holvey, but with a professional counsellor." - Scully

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION, one METHOD or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Keep it straight! Come on, straight." - Mosley Drummy

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think I located what you're looking for. It's a small miracle I found it, actually." - Dr. Kayser

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team of two or more Agents. Choose an Agent at random and attach this card to that Agent. The Agent engages in Combat against the rest of Agents on the Team. You control the Agent as an Adversary until the Combat ends. Discard this card afterwards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mulder: Are you familiar with subliminal messages?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any Team of Agents at the end of any Combat round. If the Adversary you control is still alive, you may discard the Adversary to send to the Hospital any one Agent in the Team (your choice). That Agent is reduced to zero HEALTH.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He's got a bomb. He's got a bomb. He's got a bomb. He's got a bomb. He's got a bomb..." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to any Agent in the Field. Adds 1 to that Agent's BUREAUCRACY skill once per turn while the Agent is in the Field. Discard this card when the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'll prove it to you, just help me decipher this." - Susanne

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Bluffs played at this Site cost 1 additional [CP].

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Yeah, I've found something down in Fairfax County. A derelict chicken farm with a T3 connection, paid for by Aleph Industries, Palo Alto, of which there's no other record anywhere." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card when Agent Bill Patterson is about to use his Game Effect and only if Agent Nemhauser is in his same Team. Patterson's LRC and CRC skills are doubled during the Combat. Any opponents sent to the Hospital as a result of Patterson's LRC damage do not cause him any damage that round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He bit me! The son of a bitch bit me like a dog!" - Nemhauser

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this Equipment card in your Hospital section. During your Healing phase, you may place one Keyword MEDICAL or SCIENCES ACTIVE card under this card, face down. During your Investigation phase, you may play one of these cards for 2 [RP] less. No more than 2 cards may be under this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Doggett: "Help me out here, Agent Scully."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Briefing Phase to force any opponent to skip the next Healing, Requisition and Deployment phases and go directly to the Case Assignment phase. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card may not be negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mike Millar: "You're saying the man sitting in seat thirteen-F was abducted mid-flight without any depressurization of the cabin, without any effect on the plane…"

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to an Agent with cost higher than three. Once you had successfully investigated a Site, you may remove this card and the Agent from play to ask an extra characteristic question regarding one opponent's X-File.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A genuine artifact, one of several pieces of an unknown whole…" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. This card may be played in its normal way or on any Team that includes at least one Agent with the keyword SKEPTIC, ignoring Activator requirements. The Bat Thing may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Today, he might have been fine but this thing hunts like a bat. It only attacks at night." - Ernie Stefaniuk

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard the top card from both players' Bureau decks. If your card has higher cost than your opponent's, you may add 8 tokens to your [RP] pool (if you are the active player) or to the [CP] pool (if you are the Directed player). If lower, only empty your [RP] and [CP] pools, your opponent's pools remain unaffected. Then, shuffle both Bureau Decks.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Is this what you saw? It's a Seraphim. An angel, with four faces. Those of a man, a lion, an eagle, and a bull." - Father McCue

property.name: Text
property.value: Put two tokens on this card. You can use a token to keep at your side a non-resource Witness card or a Site for an additional turn. Remove a token each time you use this ability. You can use both in the same turn. Remove this card from the game once all the tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mister Mulder, I have someone here who'd like to speak with you." - First Elder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card after answering "no" to a Characteristic Question regarding your X-File. Your opponent cannot ask about the same Characteristic for the next X turns, up to a maximum of three. X = [CP] cost paid.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We entrusted you. You failed." - Well-Manicured Man

card.name: The Falls at Arcadia, San Diego County, CA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "So is this the American dream? This place?" - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Case Assignment phase and place it in the Field. Discard this card to negate one ADVERSARY card played by your opponent this turn (or discard it in any case at the end of the Investigation Phase).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The experiments he attempted were too advanced for his understanding. The results of his experiments – unsatisfactory." - The Great Mutato

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce each Agent's LRC to 1. If target Team has more than one Agent, Your opponent may select one of those Agents not to participate in the Combat. If no Agent is chosen, then an additional LRC round will be played until your opponent selects an Agent to skip the Combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've suffered some very personal... losses recently, and... I was... I was hoping…" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to search through your Bureau Deck and draw one Keyword ACTIVE card that increases an Agent or Team skill check during the Investigation phase. Add the card to your hand and reveal it to your opponent. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "And began publishing a… what shall I call it… rag, called "The Lone Gunman."" - Morris

property.name: Text
property.value: Force your opponent to reveal their hand. Select one [CP] card. You may either play the selected card immediately (at its normal cost) or send it directly to its owner's Discard Pile. If played, the card is discarded afterwards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Yes, he is safe. We're here." - The Overcoat Woman

property.name: Text
property.value: Pay 2 [CP] to move up to 3 [RP] from your opponent's [RP] pool to your [CP] pool immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Name's Nathaniel Teager. 26 confirmed solo enemy kills. A veritable killing machine. Left for dead by the same government that created him." - Denny Markham

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a number of cards from your Bureau deck equal to the number of Agents on target team. Use the cost value of each drawn card to assign damage to any Agent in that team (your choice) as separated LRC attacks. Draw enough cards until you have numerical values to assign the damage. Shuffle the deck (including the drawn cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The Siddhi are a very mysterious and particularly powerful order of Fakirs." - C. Burks

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate one Witness card played by your opponent. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card after having successfully investigated a Site to ask an X-File's identity without incurring a penalty question. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Byers: "Why risk perfect happiness, Mulder? Why risk your lives?"Mulder: "Because I need to know the truth."Byers: "You already know the truth."

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. The Team must make an OBSERVATION 5+ skill check. If unsuccessful, choose one Agent in the Team. That Agent receives 4 points of damage but can still contribute with his skills if HEALTH rating has not been reduced to 0. Healing cards can be played to avoid the damage, as usual.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We didn't drink enough to make us sick." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Subtract one from all damage sources applied to this Adversary.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I know a lot of crips have the same dream. The Walk. In my dream, I rise up, out of my chair, and I can stand. I look down the hallway, I'm not in the ward anymore, I'm home. With my baby girl." - Amputee

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to force your opponent to play with an open hand (all cards face up) until end of turn. If a card forces your opponent to discard any card randomly from their hand, you may choose them directly.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Dr. Sandoz, I don't know if this is a secure line." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Briefing Phase, remove one Game Effect token on any Agent that normally starts with at least one token. You may only have one of this card in your Bureau deck. Remove this card from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may use this card to place up to six cards under it (face down) at any time. These cards cannot contain the Activator CONSPIRACY. You can play cards from here as if they were in your hand, with their cost increased by 1. Discard all cards if this card is negated. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You know, Byers, growing old with us ain't so bad." - Langly

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to discard all [CP] tokens from your opponent's pool. The first card with [CP] cost played by your opponent may be played for free this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card in the Field. At the beginning of each player's Debriefing Phase, each player must draw one card from their Bureau Deck and then discard one card from their Bureau Deck. Afterwards, both players must reduce their hand to seven cards, as usual.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Time acceleration is an equation, Mulder, a theory." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to allow you to exchange [CP] Pools with your opponent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Your aliens, Agent Mulder. Your little green men arrived here millions of years ago." - Well-Manicured Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Negates the effects of any one Equipment card that adds to CLOSE RANGE COMBAT Skill for the duration of this combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Knowle Rohrer? It can't be. I watched Knowle Rohrer die." - Doggett

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The deaths follow a pattern. New Jersey, New York, Scranton, and then an ad is placed here in Binghamton looking for a man exactly like the others. The killer is moving in a northerly direction." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in your Bureau section. Add 1 [RP] to your [RP] pool for every Event card you play as Active player.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They use this magnetic strip to track you, Whenever you go through a metal detector at an airport, they know exactly how much you're carrying." - Byers

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after you have received a "yes" answer to the X-File Characteristic. You may take one [RP] card from your Discard Pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "May I have complete silence, please?" - Maleeni

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard X cards from your hand to draw X cards from the top of your Bureau deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Don't get me wrong. I love all music. But I prefer the stuff that lasts." - Mr. Burt

property.name: Text
property.value: Select one card with the Keyword CONSPIRACY from your Discard Pile and reveal it to your opponent. Place it in your hand. You cannot use the card this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If I see, or suspect that you're not working alone I will terminate our communication." - Shadow Man

property.name: Text
property.value: You may move up to two Agents from the Bureau Section to the Field immediately. This card may not be played once an Adversary has forced combat until after the combat is resolved. If two Agents are moved, they must join the same Team in the Field.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Do you see anything at all?" - Doggett

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "June 30, 1908. Tungus tribesmen and Russian fur traders look up into the southeastern Siberian sky and see a fireball streaking to Earth. When it hit the atmosphere, it created a series of cataclysmic explosions that are considered to be the largest single cosmic event in the history of civilization. Two thousand times the force of the bomb that was dropped on Hiroshima."

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opposing Agent (your choice) to go to the Hospital immediately and may not contribute to the Site skill check. The Agent takes two points of damage and must be fully healed to leave the Hospital.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Every minute of every day we choose. Who we are. Who we forgive. Who we defend and protect." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent and put three cards from your Discard Pile under it. Any time during the game, you may discard one of the cards to gain a +1 modifier on one of the Keywords listed on that card. Discard this card when no cards remain under it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in your Bureau section. Add 1 [CP] to your [CP] pool for every Event card you play as Directed player.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've been thinking about this whole situation, y'know? And I think you're right. I think we won this one, I think we should just move on." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on any Agent in the Field investigating a Site with two tokens on it. The Agent is removed from play. Remove one token during each of the controlling player's Healing Phases. When no tokens remain, move the Agent to the Field.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Prisoner: "I will die in an experiment when there is no longer any use for me." Mulder: "What kind of experiment?

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to exchange both pools ([RP] and [CP]) with your opponent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They're … they're taking her. They're … oh, my God." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent with cost of 5 [RP] or less who is investigating this Site. Each time this Agent investigates any Site, you may pay that cost to force that Agent to go to the Hospital (undamaged). This card is removed when a Healing card is played on the Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He said I was the only one who'd believe him" – Diana Fowley

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard two cards from your hand (your choice) to apply a -2 modifier to any Agent's skill check on this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Nurse: "Mr. Hosteen cannot accept any visitors at this time."

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword ALIEN, ALIEN MANIPULATION or ALIEN INVESTIGATION card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This is an interesting dream. Wake up. Come on, Artie." - Arthur Dales

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during a Close Range Combat round to search your Bureau Deck for any one card with the keyword COMBAT. Reveal the card to your opponent and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Bureau deck. If the card is immediately playable, You may do so for zero cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Case Assignment phase to move one Agent in a Team assigned to a Site to another Team in the Field assigned to a different Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Crump? Is this what happened to your wife? This same thing? If you stop moving, you die?" - Mulder

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD, one RESULT or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Morgan: "What the hell is that?"Mulder: "Looks like the fuselage of a plane."

property.name: Text
property.value: Once the Combat ends, you may pay 2 [CP] to return Van Allen's Revenge to your hand. It may be played again at the same Site. Your opponent may pay 3 [RP] to cancel this effect.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Don't feel sorry. You going to hell just like I am, brother." - Ed Kelso

property.name: Text
property.value: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. This card cannot be played over Agent Alex Krycek. Vassily Peskow can use SUBTERFUGE cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I am only here, Comrade, to congratulate you on a fine job." - Krycek

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's OBSERVATION or adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've been running numbers here on the murder victims…and the strangest thing has come up." - Vicki Burdick

property.name: Text
property.value: This card adds 2 points to an Agent's LRC or CRC skill (your choice) during the Combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pick the top three cards of your Bureau deck. Use the cost of the first one for the Shaman's LRC skill, the cost of the second as CRC, and the last one as HEALTH value (draw additional cards if needed if the cost of any of those cards is not a specific number). Shuffle your Bureau afterwards (including the drawn cards).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "...there are powers that should not be disturbed... That some things are better left buried." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to allow you to look the top five cards of your opponent's Bureau deck. You can perform this action at the beginning of your opponent's Briefing Phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Oh my god. I'm taking her to the hospital." - Brian Tillman

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to decrease the cost of the first Adversary card you play in this Site by two.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "…they're called "poppets". Inside you place three thorns of a blood red rose, a strand of hair and a photo of your victim. - Proprietor

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Team in the Field. If the Team makes an OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check 5+, then they may add 2 to any Site skill check. Discard this card after you have used the Modifier.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Au nom des saints… et de la lune. Au nom des saints et des étoiles." - Colonel Wharton

property.name: Text
property.value: The next cards that you play on this site will have their cost increased by 1. Your opponents may not negate any of those cards this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I knew why my life had been spared. That I was to deliver the message of these angels. These sons of god." - Zeke Josepho

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard a card at random from your opponent's hand for each Agent investigating this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What does Rawls want? The money? $90,000 from the Bay Saint Louis robbery?" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in a Team of 2 or more Agents. That Agent initiates Combat against another Agent in the Team (your choice). Follow usual Combat rules until any of the Agents' HEALTH is reduced to zero. The Combat ends and that Agent (or both) must go to the Hospital. The remaining Team may still contribute to the Site skill check as usual.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Langly: "This device is stimulating electrical activity in the brain."

property.name: Text
property.value: Wanshang Dhole deals damage to its opponents first during each CRC round. If the HEALTH value of any opponent reaches zero after applying modifiers or healing cards,that combatant is sent to the Hospital and cannot deliver any damage back that round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Hey, Buck. What's wrong, Buck?" - Dr James Riley

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one BEHAVIORAL or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "She was strangled. He used an eight-gauge electrical cord. He took something from the body post-mortem… a trophy. A piece of fabric cut from her clothes… in the shape of a heart." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Apply a +2 modifier to any one skill check made by a Team of Agents in the Field during the Investigation phase.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I am scared for you, Mulder. And for William. The forces against us are unrelenting." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Search your Bureau deck and choose any one keyword OCCULT or OCCULT INVESTIGATION card. Show this card to your opponent, add it to your hand and shuffle your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Last checked out to a Dave Duran." - Scully

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If Anything should happen to me, or if we become separated, you must meet me here: 1255 91st St. Richville, M.D." - Note to Fox Mulder from Samantha Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword ADVERSARY card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You failed. This is your success? Killing me? The truth is… you need me, Agent Mulder." - X

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on your opponent's side. While this card is in play, your opponent cannot use cards nor Agent's Game Effects that allow them to draw cards (or search for cards) from the Bureau deck or from the Discard Pile. During your Briefing Phase pay 1 [CP] or discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I was warned by a man we both know… who I believe knows the truth…" - Scully

card.name: Zelma's Palm Readings, North Minneapolis, MN

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The palms tell me all." - Madame Zelma

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "All right, the number belongs to a company called Zeus Storage." - Pendrell

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change a Site Prerequisite to ALIEN INVESTIGATION 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It looks like Navajo. It was used during World War II. My father told me that it was the only code the Japanese couldn't break." - Scully
